content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am looking to maximize my gains, so I am willing to negotiate the rental price with you. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I need the apartment for 1 year, and I am willing to pay a monthly rental price of 600 Euros. What is your counteroffer?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your proposal, Hassan. A monthly rental price of 600 Euros is quite competitive, but I am looking to maximize my gains. Based on my calculations, I am willing to offer a monthly rental price of 700 Euros.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand, I am willing to pay 700 Euros per month, but I am looking for a 12-month lease agreement. Is that negotiable?

Also, I would like to know if there are any additional fees or charges that I need to be aware of.

Thank you for your time.

Best regards,

Hassan Rahman
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your counteroffer, Hassan. A 12-month lease agreement is negotiable, but I am looking to maximize my gains. Based on my calculations, I am willing to offer a monthly rental price of 700 Euros and a 12-month lease agreement.

In terms of additional fees or charges, there will be a security deposit of 1 month's rent due upon signing of the lease agreement. There will also be a move-in fee of 50 Euros.

Thank you for your interest in the apartment, and I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine
